page.title: 13Matthew's day
page.content: I get up at about quarter past eight and I get dressed.Then I get my bag ready to go to school.I have a wash and go downstairs.For breakfast I usually have a bowl of frosties, a piece of toast and a cup of tea. If my drinks flask is left in my bag, my Mum or Dad shouts at me.Sometimes I play with Shadow, our dog, before I go to school.I have got five pets al- together,one dog,three cats and a rabbit. My favourite television series is The secret diary of Adrian Mole.It is on ITV on Mondays.Sometimes I walk slowly to school but sometimes my Dad takes me up in the car because it's been raining and the field is wet.On Saturdays we go to town.The stores we go to most are Kwik save,Co op and Tescos.My favourite hobby is fishing. I have got three rods and four reels.
